Take a number and wait | CUPFA                             Skip to content Professional Development Deadlines Teaching Application Form News Quick Links: ←  # 3 UPDATE March 25, 2012 – From Peaceful Protest to the Politics of Confrontation “Les Profs contre la Hausse”  → Take a number and wait 
 Posted on   March 28, 2012   by   David Douglas   The following article was published in  The Link  this week. It gives a comprehensive view of the current state of labour relations at Concordia.  As CUPFA approaches its own contract renewal, we can expect to receive the same treatment from our employer. http://thelinknewspaper.ca/article/2903 
This entry was posted in  News ,  Press .
